coc.data.package 0.4.1
  • Reference

Simplify shapefile and set projected CRS

Source: R/process_coc_shapefiles.R
simplify_shapefile.Rd

Simplifies a shapefile using rmapshaper::ms_simplify() and also sets a projected CRS using sf::st_transform() since rmapshaper::ms_simplify() prefers a projected CRS.

simplify_shapefile(shapefile, projected_crs = 2163, simplify_keep_pct = 0.1)

Arguments

shapefile

An sf object with a raw CoC shapefile from read_raw_coc_shapefile()
projected_crs

The EPSG code for the projected CRS
simplify_keep_pct

The share of the shapefile to keep when simplifying

Value

The simplified sf object now in the projected CRS.

See also

read_raw_coc_shapefile() for reading in the raw shapefile

match_tract_to_coc() for using the shapefile to match CoCs to tracts
